Comments_List:
Knowledge: not much.

Skills: Casey ran a little professional development workshop, and also explored some of the philosophical underpinnings of science. This was extremely interesting and 

Insights: I became better acquainted with the research program of each professor and gained a better understanding of how they may be an intellectual resource during my degree.
Strengths: direct contact with professors that may otherwise be difficult to reach. There aren't that many social events where we get to talk to professors specifically about their own research.

Some points of possible improvement were already articulated during the end of year meeting. I personally would prefer a little more structure - perhaps a mini lecture given by each professor on specific papers or discovery that they think were foundational to the ecological or evolutionary research of today.
